function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'dump' to reach function 'free'?

Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'dump'?

loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'z < N-halo_width' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'z < N-halo_width' always executed?

dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'z < N-halo_width' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'y < N-halo_width' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'x (line 5)' affect subsequent computations?
Does the value assigned to 'y (line 5)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Does variable 'halo_width' remain in use at the end of function 'kernel'?
Does variable 'g2 (line 6)' remain in use at the end of function 'kernel'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'for (y = halo_width; y < N-halo_width; ++y) {' be considered dead code?
